What People Are Saying Making

See how designers and artists are stepping up their workflow.

As an aspiring game developer, I needed a tool to create hexagonal grids for my maps. This grid software turned out to be a blessing. With just a few clicks, I can customize the hexagon size and even add patterns to make my maps visually stunning. It's like having a dedicated grid designer at my fingertips!"

Nicole Grazioso

Director Payments & Risk | HubSpot

"Design is a language, and this software has given me a new dialect to express my ideas. It's like an artist's brush, allowing me to paint the canvas of my imagination with grids that resonate with the essence of my projects. It has truly transformed the way I bring my visions to life."

Josh Tyson

Product Manager | Capsule

"I've always believed that the heart of design lies in the grid. This software has rekindled my passion by providing a canvas where my creative ideas can truly flourish. It doesn't just offer tools; it offers a playground of possibilities, empowering me to craft designs that speak volumes."

Luisa

Senior Director of Operations | Fitbit

We're here for creatives of all backgrounds

To consider everyone in the making of patterns and designs, we test our tools for all sorts of use cases.

Graphic Designers

Create logos, icons, UI, layouts, posters, vector illustrations, and more.

Cross Stitchers

Draw various plans and patterns to dive into your next cross stitching project.

Game Designers

Whether you're looking to create a retro look or build out some illustrative plans for 2D or isometric level design, we've got your covered.

Creatives

Architecture, tattoo design, mosaics, pixel art, storyboards, you name it. We believe grids run deep into the foundational rock of most visual projects. And we want to help you leverage them.

About Us

Wooden Knight Labs

We are Wooden Knight Labs. A passionate team of creators dedicated to enhancing the world of design. Our software is the result of this dedication, crafted to empower designers like you. We believe in the seamless blend of creativity and structure, and our continuous pursuit of improvement ensures that your designs always shine. Join us in reshaping the landscape of design possibilities.
